attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Last night I saw a police program featuring police arresting men for picking up prostitutes whilst letting the prostitutes go free ? I am not a man who uses prostitutes so it shouldn't bother me but its the double standard I find irritating. 

This reminded me of a program about airports where they refused passengers permission to fly because they had been drinking in their airport lounge ! I don't drink so why should I care ? Because of the injustice of it all .

 Recently Langham was jailed for downloading illegal pictures on the internet not exactly flavour of the month I know but the web site producers weren't jailed nor the internet service provider that allowed that material to be posted nor the government that refused to censor the internet ! I'm not justifying these things but there needs to be a clear message here !

Double standards are confusing , they send mixed messages into our society . If something is wrong then surely it is wrong on all sides not just one ?

Finally and this really bugs me , "Children must go to school and if they don't their parents must go to jail ?" Why ? Why not the children ? 

I petition The Prime Minister to end these and other double standards !
